knxUltimateHueHumiditySensor.heading: HUE Humidity Sensor node
knxUltimateHueHumiditySensor.humidity_info: Link your KNX humidity group address to receive the relative humidity (%).
knxUltimateHueHumiditySensor.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue events are still emitted to your flow.
